product_name: Slime Self-Sealing Smart Presta Tube - 700 x 28-35
long_description: This tube self heals itself by sealing infected area with pre-filled SLIME sealant. Tubes filled with specially formulated Slime product seals instantly when tube is punctured or pinched. Seals punctures up to 1/8". *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This tube self heals itself by sealing infected area with pre-filled SLIME sealant.
